exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

<js>
var Jsoup = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var Elements = Packages.org.jsoup.select.Elements;
var document = Jsoup.parse(src);
var volMap = {};
var tabs = document.select(".buttons-tab a");
for (var i = 0; i < tabs.size(); i++) {
    var element = tabs.get(i);
    var text = element.text();
    var href = element.attr("href").substring(1);  
    volMap[href] = text;
}
var result = [];
var tabsDiv = document.select(".tabs .tab");
var z = source.getVariable(); // 获取用户变量
java.log(z)
for (var i = 0; i < tabsDiv.size(); i++) {
    var tab = tabsDiv.get(i);
    var tabId = tab.id();  
    var vol = volMap[tabId];  

    var items = tab.select("ul li .item-link");
    var tempItems = [];  

    for (var j = 0; j < items.size(); j++) {
        var item = items.get(j);
        var link = item.select("a").first();
        var text = link.text().trim();
        var href = link.attr("href");
        tempItems.push({ text: text, url: href, vol: vol });
    }

    // 根据变量z判断排序方式
    if (z == "目录乱序") {
        // 按数字升序排序
        tempItems.sort(function(a, b) {
            var numA = (a.text.match(/\d+/) || [0])[0];
            var numB = (b.text.match(/\d+/) || [0])[0];
            return parseInt(numA, 10) - parseInt(numB, 10);
        });
    } else {
        // 默认倒序
        tempItems.reverse();
    }

    result = result.concat(tempItems);
}

result;

</js>

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {

};

ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ c = cookie.getKey("https://read.douban.com","dbcl2") cok = String(/\d+:/.test(c)?c.match(/(\d+):/)[1]:"anonymous"); t = java.getString("$.data"); script = ``; ddd = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result"); //规范Json数据 // 定义正则表达式 const pattern = /:"(.*?)"([,\]\}])/g; // 替换逻辑 ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { // 将内容中的双引号替换为转义字符 const replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); // 返回替换后的结果 return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n/g,'\\n'); const data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { let paragraphText = ""; // 用于拼接同一个 paragraph 的 content const textList = item.data?.text || []; // 获取 text 数组 if (Array.isArray(textList)) { // 遍历 text 数组，提取 content textList.forEach(textItem => { if (textItem.content) { // 如果 content 是数组，进一步提取 if (Array.isArray(textItem.content)) { textItem.content.forEach(contentItem => { if (contentItem.content) { if (Array.isArray(contentItem.content)) { contentItem.content.forEach(cc => { paragraphText += cc.content; }); } else { paragraphText += contentItem.content; } } else if (typeof contentItem === "string") { paragraphText += contentItem; } }); } // 如果 content 是字符串，直接拼接 else if (typeof textItem.content === "string") { paragraphText += textItem.content; } } }); } else { paragraphText += textList; } return paragraphText; } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let isTargetChapter = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { // 如果已经找到目标章节，直接退出循环 if (isTargetChapter) break; // 检查是否是目标章节 if (chapterNumber === 0) { isTargetChapter = true; } else { chapterNumber--; } } else if (item.type === 'paragraph' && isTargetChapter) { // 如果是目标章节的段落，提取内容并添加到章节内容中 chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // 检查是否需要使用章节逻辑 if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // 遍历数据，提取并拼接 content data.forEach(item => { if (item.type === "paragraph") { // 筛选 type 为 paragraph 的对象 result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // 每个段落换行 } }); } // 打印最终的文章内容 }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `❗️刷新本章跳转加入书架界面❗️\n书名：${bookName}\n作者：${bookAuthor}\n\n简介：\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${bookName}》加入书架

跳转加入书架

简介：${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+bookName+"》") } } result

.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
function updateNextPageLink(html) {
    // Regex to match the "下一页" link with javascript:Next
    let r = /<a\s+class="am-btn\s+am-btn-default\s+am-radius"\s+href="([^"]+)">下一页<\/a>/;

    // Check if the regex matches the "下一页" link
    let match = html.match(r);

    if (match) {
        // Extract the href value from the match
        let hrefValue = match[1];

        // Check if the href contains "javascript:Next"
        if (hrefValue.includes("javascript:Next")) {
            // Use a regex to extract the parameters from the javascript:Next() call
            let paramRegex = /javascript:Next\('(\d+)','([^']+)'\)/;
            let paramMatch = hrefValue.match(paramRegex);

            if (paramMatch) {
                let id = paramMatch[1];      // Extract the first parameter ('220571')
                let file = paramMatch[2];    // Extract the second parameter ('30233653_2.html')

                // Construct the new href value
                let newHref = `/read/${id}/${file}`;

                // Replace the old href with the new one in the <a> tag
                let newLink = match[0].replace(hrefValue, newHref);

                // Replace the old <a> tag with the new one in the HTML
                html = html.replace(match[0], newLink);
            }
        }
    }

    // Return the updated or original HTML
    return html;
}

let final = updateNextPageLink(result);
final</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let regex = /<ul class="am-avg-sm-1 am-avg-md-2 am-avg-lg-4 am-list">(.*?)<\/ul>/s;
let list = result.match(regex)[0]

// Regex to find and replace javascript:Chapter hrefs
let update = list.replace(/href="javascript:Chapter\('(\d+)','(.*?)'\)"/g, (match, chapterId, fileName) => {
    // Construct the new href
    let newHref = `/read/${chapterId}/${fileName}`;
    
    // Return the new href format
    return `href="${newHref}"`;
});


function processHtml(html, update) {
    // Regex to detect the "下一页" link
    let r = /<a\s+class="index-container-btn"\s+href="([^"]+)">下一页<\/a>/;
    
    // Check if the regex matches the "下一页" link
    let match = html.match(r);

    if (match) {
        // If "下一页" is detected, append it to the update
        let next = match[0];  // Full <a> tag with "下一页"
        let final = update + next;
        return final;
    } else {
        // If no "下一页" is detected, return the update as is
        return update;
    }
}


end =processHtml(result, update)
end</js>
